website_summaries.verdict: One of the best headlight LED conversion kits for low-beam and fog lamps at a good price.
pros: Long lifespan with regular nightly use
Weatherproof and waterproof for difficult driving conditions
Includes the necessary accessories and parts for installation in most vehicles
cons: Lights perform poorly on high-beam settings
Only suitable for low-beam and fog lighting

customer_reviews.title: Illuminate well but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: These lights definitely do make a difference when driving at night. They illuminate much more than regular headlights. My big complaint, and I realize I should have written this month's ago, is that the right headlamp only worked for about 2 months before it went out. Obviously a defect that I should have immediately complained about. Because I didn't bring it to the attention of the seller sooner I can't comment on their integrity in this matter. Had the light not stopped working I would ha e considered it money well spent and given 5 stars. However because this is the only experience I have with this product I can only give 2.
customer_reviews.author: FAH-Q

customer_reviews.title: Halogen bulbs last longer.
customer_reviews.text: They definitely don't last 50k hours. One of the lights burnt out after 2.5 years of ownership. Definitely not 50k hours of use. The vendor stated that it's due to weather and driving conditions. I don't see how they advertise the amount of hours when regular incandescent lights last way longer than that. If you want cheap and constantly replacing them, get these. They're definitely brighter than halogen bulbs, but the LED lights do not last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Weak plastic for mounting *update* good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Tried to install in 09 acura mdx high beam. Twisted into place and heard a crunch noise. Sent back and ordered from different manufacturer. *manufacturer contacted me after my return to the retailer. Apologized and offered an upgraded model for the inconvenience to keep as a back-up. Very solid company with regard to customer service. Win Power 9006 LED Headlight Conversion Kit All-in-One CSP LED Chips 6000K 8000LM Cool White Automobile Headlight Bulbs- 2 Year Warranty
customer_reviews.author: W. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright and easy installment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this led bulb to replace my 2008 odyssey low beam light. You can see the difference automatically when driving, they handle the cold weather very good in the Northeast. Even when we had those very cold morning, they brighten the road very clear as day light. Very impressive and both a set for my wife Toyota 4runner. I had the bulbs for about 1yr and something, until today the 1 led bulb acting up. Look like the led is going. I am going to email Winpower and see how it go.
customer_reviews.author: E Plummer

customer_reviews.title: super bright.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are awesome. Super bright, simple to install. If you have not read the install sheet, note that you MAY have to invert the connection to the stabilizer. My lights worked fine without the stabilizer and you connect them normally, but I had to reverse the polarity on the stabilizer when I introduced it in the mix. This is not intuitive because the clip is only on one side of the connection i.e. if you invert it the clips no longer hold the connection in place. No big deal just letting you know. These things made a huge difference in my nighttime vision and I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better than hologen.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right so I figured I would give these a try. The install on our 2004 Explorer was easy. We haven't had any flickering issues and the field of vision has greatly increased compared to the halogen bulbs we were using previously. I will say the headlights on this vehicle are certainly dull and if they were clear I would expect these lights to be even better. The quality of the lights seem on par for the price paid. We will see how long they last. It has been a week and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Colt and Missy

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 2 worked! Hey that's 50% odds, so not bad?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 9006 LED's pair for 29.99, one led did not work out of the box. I will be returning this item. Connector is very cheap, no water gasket on bulb wire. The led housing itself looks well made though and durable, bulb housing felt secure into headlight assembly. I may have just been unlucky with the bad bulb, or it may be that the seller that purposely packages 1 working bulb of 2 as there was no tape or package securement from manufacturer. I will go with worst case and just return and not do business with the seller due to the lack of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kline

customer_reviews.title: Check for fan clearance, not just connection
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 4 stars because I love the idea of converting to LED from halogen and I'm very hopeful it will help with night driving. I'm sure these lights are great and they came well packaged with excellent directions. Unfortunately, my 2000 Chevy Tahoe has a non-removable housing cover over the back of the low beam that doesn't allow enough clearance for the fan end of the light to fit, so I have to return them. Amazon garage said these would fit my vehicle, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: A. Keating

customer_reviews.title: Light of my life
customer_reviews.text: Lights are fantastic. I bought these to replace my wife's 98 suburban headlights that were slowly but surely dying out and no longer very effective. I didn't need to use the entire kit. Actually, it wouldn't work when I tried to. I like these much better than the HIDs in my Bronco and soon will be replacing those with these as well.
customer_reviews.author: BaneTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Installed the bulbs in my 2004 Toyota Sequoia and I am so pleased. Plug and play. The fan runs when u have it your vehicle in accessory mode if you have daytime running lights. Dont freak out... Install is simple if vehicle allows you to get to bulbs quickly. The lights are super white. You won't see to much of a difference between high beans and lows. If your have fog lights make sure you match them. If you have a cone reflector inside of your headlight housing, they still will work. Highly recommended them for the money plus the 2 year warranty. Win Power will email if you have any questions or need help.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cant see in the rain
customer_reviews.text: i liked the headlights at first because they dont take long to come on full blast like a HID. They are brighter than a traditional halogen bulb the issue is that if you are driving at night, in the rain, and on anywhere close to new black top you cant see a damn thing. the lack of light is so bad that they are actually kind of dangerous. so i would just drive with my fog lights on in the rain which sucks. they were in my truck for just over two years and 3 out of 4 of the LED on each light had failed. just leave it factory
customer_reviews.author: Troybrowntb

customer_reviews.title: Clean crisp light, better than hid!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright clean light. Brighter than my hid kit, I only have 4 starts for now because I'm not sure about the life of the bulbs yet. As of now I'd recommend to anyone wanting to upgrade their halogen bulbs, don't get a hid kit if you don't have to. The light is very crisp and white!!!!!! Still working and I'm quite a bit more than some of the bad reviews have stated, I'm sure that if there are problems within the first few days they'll replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Hartzel

customer_reviews.title: On My 3rd set
customer_reviews.text: Package is air sealed and comes with everything need for a easy installation, they even include small zip ties for the extra cable. I have three sets one for my acura, chevy and dodge. My acura has them on since 2017 and still running strong and bright. Only thing is the fan on one side is starting to squeek.
customer_reviews.author: Ray from Anaheim CA

customer_reviews.title: 2006 Jeep grand Cherokee good/bad
customer_reviews.text: 06 Jeep grand Cherokee. Just got them yesterday and installed them quick and easy. Pros: easy install, Super Bright, Worked Great at Night driving, pretty crazy what difference they make!!!👌 Cons: Flicking like crazy if i use the adapters they came with. When the car is off 1 headlight stays on 15 seconds longer then the other. This is my 2nd pair since i have one set on my 13' Ralliart. On my car install it was Easy and No Problems yet!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great company
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 1998 GMC K2500 to replace the low beam headlights 12/2017. They are very bright, and I can see much better. One of the bulbs failed after 19 months. The company was very prompt in its communications with me. In the 3 days since I first contacted them, the issue has been sorted out, and new replacement bulbs are on the way. I am very happy with the bulbs, and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly bright, water proof and a great fit. They fit perfectly in the Fog light housing of my 2004 Mercedes W203 C240.Great packaging and some adapters that I didn't need to use. Most importantly, there are NO error codes or bulb-out, from the CANBUS.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fog lights! I put these on my 2008 GTI and they are just as bright as my driving lights! If you like to see everything while driving I highly recommend these. This is my second pair, only 1 bulb got corroded in a little over a year. Still a fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Lights won't stay on constantly, headlights "wink" as you are going down the road, freaks me out! Had to go out and purchase another set, from the auto store, which work perfectly. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baeder

customer_reviews.title: Headlights were very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Headlights were very easy to install. Just like changing a bulb. You need to mount the ballasts which are very compact and easy ti zip tie or foam two sided tape near the headlulight. They are very bright, a huge improvement iver my original equipment and better that my Sylvania Ultrastars, which cost more than these. They are a nice color 6000k, which looks like modern OEM led headlights. I only have about six hours on them, so can’t yet say how long lived they will be, but if the product information is accurate, they will last a long time. A HUGE value. It’s a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Zuidema

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service should it be needed
customer_reviews.text: Just installed 1 bulb from the second set I ordered to fix the one that stopped working. I bought the original set last December so one quite in 8 months. I also noticed that the first set I bought came with a black box that plugged into the vehicles wiring harness and a smaller silver box that the bulb was connected to. The new set just had the bulb and silver box so I'm unsure if they've updated the kit or if I've gotten a set that's missing parts. Winpower contacted me after I expressed concern and have sent me a new set of bulbs. Great customer service and I'm happy with the bulbs performance and the seller
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K. Slenk

customer_reviews.title: Good color temp. Not as bright as mkr cree bulbs but sti bright
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried many led headlight that are sold here on amazon. The last pair were led import usa headlights (opt7 replicas as well as mictuning and cougarmotor led bulbs)these replaced and those went strong for two years till one bulb started to flicker then failed. I feel like the mkr cree bulb disperse the light better, these are similar but have more dark spots than those i had replaced, they also were a tad brighter. If these lasts just as long as those then these are great replacements. The color temerature is closer to a 5000k than 6000k which i like because they look more natural and not blueish like some of the others.
customer_reviews.author: david_es2

customer_reviews.title: For the money it is the best LED upgrade for your car
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is the best LED upgrade for your car. They came with everything needed and installation was simple. I got some for my fog lights and they went in with no problem. The headlight on my Buick is slightly offset so I had to enlarge the opening, but after that they went right in. Nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Silverado Classic with some work
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my Duramax 2500HD Classic and they work great so far. They will fit with some work, I had to shave the plastic bracket behind the headlight so the bulb fan could fit through since it's pretty big. I've attached a picture of where I trimmed a hole into the bracket. Overall decent set of bulbs, my hids were brighter but I will keep these for now.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Work great for my fog lights.
customer_reviews.text: Installed them to my 07 Ram 1500, for fog lights today. When I connect them, they didn't turn on but they sent decoders too. I connected decoders and worked. No flickers, no error on my dash. Bright and work amazing! I think I don't need turn on headlights.
customer_reviews.author: KOR

customer_reviews.title: I cannot reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Both of them went out in a matter of days days. They were nice until they just stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, for a price
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 1997 GMC Sierra 1500, they are awesome for seeing at night. Being it rain, heavy snow and your everyday driving. Another good part is it doesn't seem to blind other motorist. As I have never been flashed since installing. Next I'll probably install them in my diesel, depending on if I have enough clearance for the heatsink.
customer_reviews.author: Coldwind

customer_reviews.title: Non Stop Flickering.. do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Spent the extra money on these bulbs becaue I didn’t want to deal with additional wiring to make other bulbs work. These bulbs flicker. I have a Lexus GS and was to use these as the DRL and high beam . In addition to the flickering - these would not fit properly in to the headlamp. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Windpower products
customer_reviews.text: They are not as bright as described and the colors are not the same. Plus I bought some off the Wish App that are brighter and way more affordable. Save your money and get something real not falsely advertised. Now they are giving a hard time for my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Lozano

customer_reviews.title: The best option for seeing better at night
customer_reviews.text: I have these bulbs in two different cars. I tried them on my car and loved them so much I put them in my wife’s car also. She loved them. It’s nice that street signs reflect from my headlights now. So well I can see them a block away making seeing stop signs and street signs easy after dark. They are well worth the money. Just make sure if you have different bulbs for you dim lights and brights you’ll want to replace all four bulbs or you’ll end up wondering why your brights are dimmer than your dim lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play hassle free
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and really easy to install. The price is really under valued as this can compare to any high end set of hid lights. Super bright and perfect color temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Growtoshi

customer_reviews.title: Lights seem to be very sturdy. They came very well packaged and i had ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights seem to be very sturdy. They came very well packaged and i had them installed in about five minutes in my old '98 k1500. They are significantly brighter than the old dim lights they replaced. We'll see how they hold up, for now I'm very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Perform great, some cutting, not sure how long they'll last
customer_reviews.text: Product performance is excellent, but installation requires some cutting the plastic behind the bulb. I just used a cut off wheel. The base of the bulb is much larger than a stock bulb so there isn't enough room to tilt them into place. It wasn't enough to compromise the strength of the mount. I'm sure you could take the whole headlight assemblies apart, but it would have been much more work than it was worth in my opinion. Time will tell how long they will last. I'm going to buy the high beam now, as the low beams make the high beams look weak.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ewert

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time and money to change them.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these bulbs in my daughters 2003 Accord after I polished her headlight lenses. Big improvement over factory bulbs! The clearer the lenses are the better they work obviously but hers are pretty clear and shine pretty bright. Worth the time and money to change them.
customer_reviews.author: rins71mc

customer_reviews.title: First one burned out exactly 30 days past the 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice and bright, the difference from std Halogen is amazing. Will never use halogen bulbs again. Just wish they lasted longer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: DarthDaddy98

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: lost color within a month. Turned a hazy green that was noticeable in the beam pattern. This is for a 2014 ram 1500. Bought fog lights too. They weren’t that great either. I give it to them though they have excellent customer service but I guess you have to though when you have crap headlights to sell. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Rh

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out LED Headlight
customer_reviews.text: One bulb went out and it’s barely been 4 hours of use, gonna have to use my fog lights at night or I’ll get pulled over, I need a quick repair
customer_reviews.author: Steven Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than bright , but not blinding
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Perfect plug and play fit for 2004 Chevy Avalanche. Tested pattern and placement at night with wife driving a Mini Cooper in front of me. She had no issue with the brightness , said they looked great and even when I “bright lighted” her while driving behind she said, “although they were VERY BRIGHT, it was not a blinding light”. My thoughts are ...They make the lines in the road “pop” and road signs, are by far easier to see , and be seen at a further distance . I recommend them and will be getting more for our other vehicles soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Blazetamer

customer_reviews.title: ... others on Amazon was going to give us a good product, but we are so pleased with our ...
customer_reviews.text: We weren't sure that buying headlights that were so much less expensive than others on Amazon was going to give us a good product, but we are so pleased with our purchase! These new headlights for our 2002 Toyota Camry make it safe to drive at night again.
customer_reviews.author: cre612

customer_reviews.title: Okay could be better for the money
customer_reviews.text: LED's work just fine. However the plastic for the housing with the locking tabs is brittle. One of mine was received broken already which is what's in using to determine the plastic as brittle. Hopefully having 1 off the 3 tabs won't allow it to have condensation build up in the headlight housing.
customer_reviews.author: Guy68632

customer_reviews.title: Dont last long... sitck with halogen?...
customer_reviews.text: Several leds on one bulb have failed after 24 months.... trying to contact seller to see what can be done... leds should last more that a reg halogen bulb... just sayn... again. On a newer set. Please help. Thank you or your time.
customer_reviews.author: fatvdub

customer_reviews.title: Big thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Don't get these, just don't. Spreads light everywhere except where it's needed. sure they're bright, but it's not worth blinding others on the road and not being able to see the road myself. 2001 Miata with projector lenses
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fistr

customer_reviews.title: perfect in evo x 2011
customer_reviews.text: been using these in my evo and they work great. i got tired of the expensive halogen bulbs burning out every 6 months, these have been going strong since day 1
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Great enhancement
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lights for 2 weeks like a lot if others said they burn out fast one has already gone out the fan still works but no led so I'm returning them for a refund and spending a little more on a better pair not so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: G.Loyd

customer_reviews.title: C5 Corvette Problems
customer_reviews.text: Nice color bulbs, but I thought they would NOT cause electric problems for my C5 Corvette and they do! My pop up lights will not go down when turning them off! Any suggestions? I've installed hyper flash harness under the dash to help but no luck! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Clark Diamond

customer_reviews.title: ... I decided to try them and I really am satisfied with them the same if not better then HID's ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first as I was just used to HID's but a coworker told me about these showed them to me and for the price I decided to try them and I really am satisfied with them the same if not better then HID's easier to plug in no problem but I can only give them four stars because I have only had them for a short amount of time i still dont know if they will be a hassle to deal with like the HID's but over all I am really satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the bulbs didn't work. Had to order another pair from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: ShowTyme

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: This led light are amazing they work perfectly on my traiblazer. They are very bright compare to the regular one this led does the job very bright it gives a blue color to it which is perfect. I plug them in with no problem it fits perfectly. Very satisfied with the purchase i will recommend this product to anyone who need some good quality led lights this are the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: These headlights are horrible the plugs don't even match up I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: These headlights are horrible the plugs don't even match up I had to swap them and then tape them together and they always go out they are Junk and I will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Before returning read this if theu do not work
customer_reviews.text: When i first installed the light they did not work. Thsts when i remembered that led are polarity sensitive. So i plugged the connector in upside down and they work. Also had to readjust the headlights (lower them) bringd a new look to my 2004 ford.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Work great for Rams!
customer_reviews.text: 2014 Ram 1500 Laramie . Used these in the fogs. They have been in for only a few days and they have been Excellent. No errors or flickering with the mopar CANBUS system. Ill update if there are any issues or if they fail.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Really tight squeeze for fog lights but I got them to fit and that works for me. Very, very bright when I lit them up before putting them in the housing. I'm missing an inner fender so one of these gets hit pretty good with the weather from the wheelwells and it still works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wetherby

customer_reviews.title: these led bulbs are well made and super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: these led bulbs are well made and super easy to install. came well packaged with extras. bright focused beam pattern. wish i could of add an additional star for customer service. seller is very helpful and willing to address any issues.
customer_reviews.author: dre

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit well, one partially died
customer_reviews.text: They didn't fit great and one got pretty flickery and had some of the LEDs die after a few months. I pulled them after less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright! Low beams are as bright or brighter than halogen high beams. Install was pretty easy, plug and play. The fans are pretty quiet too. Only been in a few days but I’m hoping they last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gimondo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. I've had no problems.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these lights. They're bright and clear. There's no flicker like I've heard people mention. Shipping was super fast with Prime. Install was a breeze. It was as simple as just changing out a bulb and plugging it in. Using a 9006 bulb for the low beam on a '97 Crown Victoria.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they are brighter
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs seem brighter but there is no bright spot and the drivers beam seemed way to far left. Not as bright as my stock headlights.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Much brighter than expected!  Great performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace the bulbs in a 2000 Toyota Camry. Installation was a breeze - no issues with connectors or space. Installation did not require any accessories or the CANBUS adapter. The fans are quiet and the light is bright, white, and in a uniform pattern. I have had these installed for 2 months now and as of this moment would purchase them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: booklove

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my 2003 Avalanche. The metal behind the headlights required some slight trimming to make room for these as the fan motors stick out quite a bit. Very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Tenatra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in Mercedes w203 fog lights.
customer_reviews.text: lasted two months and burned out. We’ll see what seller says.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: The light output is pretty much identical
customer_reviews.text: I just got these as part of prime day. I just installed the h13 in my 2013 f150. There is virtually no difference between the hi/low function. The light output is pretty much identical. Not sure if I got a defective set or something??
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Kensky

customer_reviews.title: Just put them in but my 1st impression is they ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put them in but my 1st impression is they are MUCH brighter than old Silverstar bulbs. Will reserve final review until they are in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, short life
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright, which I love. The color is great, more white than blue. Only problem is they have a very short life span. I have bought two sets now in less than 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Grundon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality clip
customer_reviews.text: Clip does not securley fasten to vehicle cable. Concerened that while driving the connection will become loose and headlights will stop working. Light itself is a very nice and great color. These bulbs where the 9006 and used on an 03 Camry.
customer_reviews.author: fang

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the road
customer_reviews.text: Much brighter light. Love how it illuminates road signs at quite a distance and the signs when I am close enough, are easier to read. Installation was easy (for the vehicle).
customer_reviews.author: R. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I had these for 1 year now. Excellent visibility with wider angle. I bought 2 Incase a bulb or Ballast or a went bad early on. There still working
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One has already stopped working only had for a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these led about 8 months ago. I asked the seller to send me replacements because one of the bulb is not working. The bulbs have a 2 year warranty. The seller is asking for pictures of the bulb when I took off the bulbs because one bulb don’t turn on. UPDATE win power sent me my replacements the warranty is good. These bulbs are the best. I have them in all my cars super bright no blind spots.
customer_reviews.author: Angel C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, easy to install and quick shipping, very nice light
customer_reviews.author: JLuis

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Fits very well unlike the,other Win Power product I just returned. Super easy installation
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Driver side LED bulb lasted only 6 months & 19 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and one of the lights is blinking after you turn off the switch
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs were great when they both worked
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs were great when they both worked.... very bright for low beam. One went out after about 2 months. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After install looks great! It is noisy somewhat
customer_reviews.text: After install looks great! It is noisy somewhat, but I don't hear anything inside the car cabin. So, all good for me and installation was pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: VB Spike

customer_reviews.title: Never got to even see them work.
customer_reviews.text: These are too long to fit the housing for a 2001 Chevy Suburban 2500. If you were to completely disassemble the entire housing, including the adjusting mechanism and everything, then these might fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: besides that I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Really bright so bright I’m worried drivers in front gets blinded by the lights. Example anyone who drives a sedan or and car.. Im sure you had a truck Drive behind you and their headlights hits your eyes.. well I feel that way with the LEDs.. soon yet I have to ask a friend to drive in front of me to tell me how it really is.. besides that I love it..
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: This item is no good at all
customer_reviews.text: These lights don’t work they flash and are not bright at all and one led is burnt out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: failed after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: the fan failed after one year, Win Power provided a replacement (looks like a newer design) without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Foul

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in a box
customer_reviews.text: These things will light up the countryside, recommend getting matching high beams as well so when people flash you for their brightness you can unleash the beast upon their unsuspecting eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time and money, buy a better quality product, this lights only lasted for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Belmonte

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a day.
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning item. One burned out in less than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Castoro

customer_reviews.title: May have to do some trimming
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 silverado. I had to trim the plastic bracket inorder for the mm to fit but that's not iffy for me. When you cut a whole in the rack make sure you don't get the top half off. Other then that they are nice
customer_reviews.author: Hondo629

customer_reviews.title: Less don't last in the cold of Wisconsin. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Less don't last in the cold of Wisconsin. I've tried at least 3 different brands and none last more than maybe a year.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Legend

customer_reviews.title: Best for its price
customer_reviews.text: Best brand on the market, Warrantys Are Fast!! I literally recomend everyone to get turboLed
customer_reviews.author: Swayy.

customer_reviews.title: I love them! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the brightness of these bulbs. I put them in my 13’ Civic Si, over all great I will buy again for my other vehicles. Bright blue, almost white light. Keep in mind they have cooling fans on the back of them. When you shut your car off, if your lights stay on for a second you will hear them running. Don’t freak out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: O have the headlights aswell as these for my fog ...
customer_reviews.text: O have the headlights aswell as these for my fog lights The lights are very bright. The two star is because I had to purchase a second complete set because the little silver box burned up on one side in less than 6 months and I couldn't find just the box/wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst LED lights ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst lamps on Amazon.. worked for 1 week before the a bulb burnt out.. high beams also dont work properly.
customer_reviews.author: edo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: installed one about one hour both high and low beams 9006 and 9005 bright as advertized
customer_reviews.author: C. Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit without cutting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged decently but don't believe the fit chart. Does not fit 2004 Silverado or 2006 Tahoe for low beam 9006, so I am sure it will not fit 1999-2006 Chevy or GMC full size vehicles without modifications to the adjusting plate. They plug up fine but the cooling fan interferes with the mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Weber

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really bright. Very satisfied. I'd say they are 6500k even though they are rated at 6000k. (The bottom lights are flood lights I bought from another company)
customer_reviews.author: Gigi & Ant Boogie

customer_reviews.title: What I like most about the LED lights is the fans were ...
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about the LED lights is the fans were quiet that cool the light and the lights were bright and easy to install. If you install them on a 2001 Chevy 2500 HD you have to modify the Lens to make the fan fit if you have a 04 GMC Sierra 2500 HD you will not have to cut anything to make the fans fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for any vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this product. They fit perfect and are extremely bright. A great inexpensive upgrade for any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my 2004 Toyota Sienna. So much better than the original bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my 2004 Toyota Sienna. So much better than the original bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: J Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Go HID!
customer_reviews.text: HID's are much brighter, we will see how long these last.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good led bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Good led bulbs, the pattern could be a little better but that could also be the cars headlamp assemblies needing adjusted. I put a set of their h11's just like these and they fit perfectly without adjustments and light output is great hardly have to use my high beams.
customer_reviews.author: Nate2826

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, however one of the lights that I recently ordered just randomly went out. I was pretty disappointed. But they have amazing customer service and promptly remedied the issue!
customer_reviews.author: James Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! But the uniformity of the beam isn't right, too tall for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Connector is loose, fan does not turn on and light does not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: R Cab

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as expected and did not ft correctly
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: 1990 Chevy C3500 Dually Extended Cab
customer_reviews.text: No issues! Plug and play. Even with the headlight lenses needing a thorough cleaning these led’s are supplying light and then some. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Nemesis

customer_reviews.title: Work for 2year
customer_reviews.text: Product lighted ok and Worked ok until 2years exactly then 4 days after warranty both burned out fan quit working, and vehicle only used about 1to2 hours at nightat most. Contacted seller no answer yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

product_meta.title: Win Power 9006 LED Headlight Bulbs Conversion Kit 6000k Cool White 7200 Lumens HB4 Cree Fog Lights/Low Beam Headlight Bulb Replacement+ Canbus-2 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: 【SUPER BRIGHT】Turbo led 9006 headlight bulb, Super bright and energy-efficient with 70W per pair(35W Per bulb), 7200LM 6000K Cool White LED bright light. 200% brighter than Halogen headlights.
【HIGH POWER IMPORT CREE CHIP】 Top CREE LED chips have an expected lifespan of 50,000 hours, Win Power ensure a perfect beam pattern without any dark spots or foggy light.
【ENERGY-EFFICIENT TURBO BULBS】12,000 RPM High-speed, IP67 waterproof turbo fan is employed to effectively control heat ensuring continuous full lumens output.
【FITMENT】 9006/HB4, Easy Installation. Perfect replacement for HID & Halogen Lights. Apply to High or low Beam headlamp, Fog light etc.

【NOTE】Please check the bulb size of your stock bulbs, if you are not sure which bulb size fits for your vehicle, please feel free to contact us.We provide super decoders for sale if your car have error code or flickering problems.
